text: Jordan won't seek third speaker vote, allowing House to empower interim speaker  —  Rep. Jordan's off-ramp  —  It seems as if reality is finally beginning to creep into Rep. Jim Jordan's (R-Ohio) orbit. … On Tuesday, 20 GOP lawmakers voted against Jordan.  A day later, he lost 22 Republican votes.  —  Put simply, the votes aren't moving toward Jordan, they're moving away from him.
